Razor Claw glared at the three opponents with hate in his eyes and drool dr=
ipping from his jaw. The raptor no longer had control of his actions and wo=
uldn't be stopped until justice had been served. "You fear me." He states t=
hrough a half closed mouth. 

He looked back at his origional prey, "You fe=
ar me so much that you will not fight one on one." He took a few steps forw=
ard lowering his head to the level of Wolveritron so they could look eye to=
 eye. The anger and hatred split the air as the two looked toward each othe=
r. The teeth of one and the claws of the acused reflected in the light arou=
nd. Two bots enter, one bot leaves and if Razor Claw had his way the Wolver=
ine in bot mode would be the apetizer.


  ----- Original Message ----- 
  =
From: dachande 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Sunday, February 11, =
2001 6:30 AM
  Subject: Re: Dachande respond or else


  ::Wolveritron/Ecli=
pse/Ramus::
   
      "I fight you now, bubb" Wolveritron said. "Because yo=
u ticked me off."
      Eclipse transformed to his full out battle mode, st=
anding at nine feet tall. His claws extended to their full length, 5 inches=
. His teeth were gleaming, they were ready to have mech fluid on them.
    =
  Ramus pulled his crossbow up and aimed it at Razor Claw.
      "We're rea=
dy for ya," They said. They would not make the first move, though.
    ----=
- Original Message ----- 
    From: CYBERWOLF4 
    To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.=
com 
    Sent: Sunday, February 11, 2001 9:38 AM
    Subject: Re: Dachande =
respond or else


    Razor Claw rolled out the busted windshield using the=
 tuck and roll technique to avoid excessive damage. 

    "You decide to fi=
ght after all I see." the raptor yells in his rage. he charges forward biti=
ng at Wolveritron. "You fight me now, after leaving your team to fight alon=
e? I will kill you slowly."


      ----- Original Message ----- 
      Fro=
m: dachande 
      To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
      Sent: Saturday, Februa=
ry 10, 2001 7:47 AM
      Subject: Re: Dachande respond or else


      He =
is.
       
      ::Wolveritron/Eclipse/Ramus::
       
          His claws=
 dropped from his hands. "Who said I'm lettin others fight for me, Bub?"
  =
        "Wolveritron, this is what he wants," Eclipse said, putting his han=
d out, holding Wolveritron back. "Don't give it to him."
          "Don't t=
ell me who I can fight," Wolveritron said.
          Ramus pulled his energ=
y crossbow out (He's a twin of Ramulus). "I have no problem giving him what=
 he wants."
          He didn't fire though.
